title: Ticket #7233: Document to how isolate low-latency slots from general purpose slot
description: LIGO has machines dedicated to low-latency jobs that are frequently idle. Ideally, they would like to be able to backfill these machines which poorer priority jobs, as long as they can absolutely guarantee that when work shows up for the more important slots, there is a minimal (< 1 second?) latency impact on the high priority jobs.
remarks:

This has been temporarily implemented via two startds (#7254) but will be implemented via one startd soon (#7350).
